name: feat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 something difficult needing a lot of skill, strength, courage, etc. to achieve it: feat of The Eiffel Tower is a remarkable feat of engineering. She performed remarkable feats of organization for the company.

an act that shows skill, strength, or bravery: a feat of unusual strength Getting the house painted was quite a feat.
